companyDescription: 7-Eleven Malaysia Holdings Berhad is an investment holding company that operates 7-Eleven convenience stores in Malaysia through its major subsidiary, 7-Eleven Malaysia Sdn. Bhd. It is the pioneer and largest 24-hour standalone convenience store operator in Malaysia.
